body.name: Baby Shampoo and Body Wash - Avocado Oil - Essential Oil - Natural - 8oz
body.stockDetail: Only 7 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 1 hr 58 mins.
features: Our natural baby wash is made with certified organic ingredients.
It is free of harsh chemicals, dyes, and fragrances.
The gentle formula is safe for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
It is made with plant-based ingredients that are gentle on the environment.
The baby wash is easy to use and rinses off clean.
body.description: Introducing our new baby wash! Our gentle head-to-toe formula is made with avocado oil to soften and moisturize your baby's skin, and it's free from harsh chemicals like parabens, sulfates, and synthetic fragrances. Plus, it comes in a variety of essential oil-based scents, so you can choose the perfect one for your little one. Our baby wash is perfect for use on all skin types, including sensitive skin, and it's gentle enough for daily use. Give it a try today and see the difference for yourself! You get 2 scents in this set. Milk + Honey and Lavender + Chamomile. These are 8 ounce bottles. Ingredients: ​Aqua, Organic Avocado Oil, Organic Potassium Cocoate, Organic Potassium Oleate, Lauryl Betain, Organic Glycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Palm Kernelate, Palm Kernel Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Potassium Citrate, Organic Extracts and/or Essential Oils (if scented)
